DataElement.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Attention Concentration Complete Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the total score of the evaluation of a neurocognitive assessment of attention.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Attention Concentration Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a neurocognitive evaluation of attention (the act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others) completed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (noor-uh-LOJ-ik) Having to do with nerves or the nervous system.:Cognitive; of or being or relating to or involving cognition.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.
Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: The act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Attention Total Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the total score of the evaluation of a neurocognitive assessment of attention.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
